about_me: I'm a Software Developer with a passion for web development, data analytics, and game development. Right now, I'm studying the Software Developer Course at iO Academy, where I'm learning a whole bunch of exciting concepts and working on some cool projects.

project_one.name: PokéAPI
project_one.about: Iv'e created a web app which allows users to search for any Pokémon by name. The application seamlessly connects to the PokeAPI to retrieve detailed information, including stats, abilities, types, and images. The fetched data is displayed in an intuitive and user-friendly interface, making it easy for users to explore and learn about their favorite Pokémon

project_two.name: KANKEI
project_two.about: I designed and developed a website for KANKEI Ltd., a leadership consultancy firm, focused on delivering a clean, professional, and modern user experience. Ultimately, the website was migrated to WordPress to provide the client with enhanced functionality and ease of content management

project_three.name: Email Automation
project_three.about: This Python script automates email organization by moving emails from a specified sender to a chosen folder on an IMAP server. It handles authentication securely, processes emails in batches, and ensures efficient cleanup.
